channel.title: Comments on: The Perfect Tire Tread ?

item.title: By: Brent
item.dc:creator: Brent
item.description: I sent an email to Toyo to see if they knew, I'll let you know if I hear anything
item.content:encoded: I sent an email to Toyo to see if they knew, I’ll let you know if I hear anything

item.title: By: awash
item.dc:creator: awash
item.description: I reached out to the photographer who couldn't quite remember but thought it might be a 2007 Toyo. No luck matching it as of yet.
item.content:encoded: I reached out to the photographer who couldn’t quite remember but thought it might be a 2007 Toyo. No luck matching it as of yet.

item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.description: when I do a google image search I'm not seeing any old federal tires that look the same, although in the same search I saw some Lexani tires that seemed to be a closer match, the search continues...
item.content:encoded: when I do a google image search I'm not seeing any old federal tires that look the same, although in the same search I saw some Lexani tires that seemed to be a closer match, the search continues…

item.title: By: BloodyMary
item.dc:creator: BloodyMary
item.description: i think it's Federal 225/45R17. not the latest season though
item.content:encoded: i think it's Federal 225/45R17. not the latest season though

item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.description: close match, and those are cool as well, but it's definitely a different tread. the one I posted has less cuts into the rubber and a different overall pattern, but there are a lot of similarities maybe it's the same brand?
item.content:encoded: close match, and those are cool as well, but it's definitely a different tread. the one I posted has less cuts into the rubber and a different overall pattern, but there are a lot of similarities maybe it's the same brand?

item.title: By: Barb
item.dc:creator: Barb
item.description: <a href="http://www.generaltire.com/tires/AltiMAX-HP" rel="nofollow">http://www.generaltire.com/tires/AltiMAX-HP</a> I have these on my Freestyle. Great tire!!
item.content:encoded: http://www.generaltire.com/tires/AltiMAX-HP I have these on my Freestyle. Great tire!!

item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.content:encoded: some other cool ones here: http://www.istockphoto.com/search/lightbox/408633…

item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.description: or even if you don't know who designed it, does anyone even know what tire brand this is?
item.content:encoded: or even if you don't know who designed it, does anyone even know what tire brand this is?
